abstract.t: Application-Layer Traffic Optimization (ALTO) service aims to providedistributed applications with information to perform better-than-random initial peer selection when multiple peers in the network areavailable to provide a resource or service. In order to discover anApplication-Layer Traffic Optimization (ALTO) Server, a set ofmechanisms are required. These mechanisms enable applications tofind an information source which provides them with informationregarding the underlying network. This document discusses variousscenarios of ALTO discovery and specifies the use of severalavailable options such as DHCP or DNS.
